attributes.action: Create a new Bank Holiday,”NHS Day” to celebrate our fabulous NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Once the Coronavirus crisis is over I would like a new Bank Holiday date to be agreed which can be celebrated for all future generations.
A new bank holiday in their honour is something that would unite the nation
attributes.background: Our country has been divided for too long, and a celebration of our NHS after all the work that they have been doing would be a real tonic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
